languages.text: "Тогда ты обязана отомстить за них и покарать виновного. Провидец прямо перед тобой".

traits.locale_text: "Тогда ты обязана отомстить за них и покарать виновного. Провидец прямо перед тобой".

languages.text: "Then it is your duty to avenge them and punish those responsible. There is a Farseer right in front of you."
languages.original_text: "Тогда ты обязана отомстить за них и покарать виновного. Провидец прямо перед тобой".

traits.locale_text: "Then it is your duty to avenge them and punish the culprit. There is a Farseer right in front of you."
"Then it is your duty to avenge them and punish the culprit. There is a Farseer right in front of you."
"Then it is your duty to avenge them and punish those responsible. There is a Farseer right in front of you."
"Then it is your duty to avenge them and punish those responsible. There is a Farseer right in front of you."
"Then it is your duty to avenge them and punish those responsible. There is a Farseer right in front of you."

languages.text: «Entonces tu deber es vengar su destrucción y castigar a los culpables. Y tienes a un vidente justo delante de ti».
languages.original_text: "Then it is your duty to avenge them and punish those responsible. There is a Farseer right in front of you."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces tu deber es vengar su destrucción y castigar a los culpables. Y tienes a un vidente justo delante de ti».

languages.text: 「それなら彼らの仇を討ち、責任ある者たちを罰するのがお前の義務だろう。先見司はお前の目の前にいるぞ」
languages.original_text: "Then it is your duty to avenge them and punish those responsible. There is a Farseer right in front of you."

traits.locale_text: 「それなら彼らの仇を討ち、責任ある者たちを罰するのがお前の義務だろう。先見司はお前の目の前にいるぞ」

languages.text: “既然如此，你有责任为那些死难者报仇，惩罚那些该对此负责的人。而现在就有个先知站在你面前。”
languages.original_text: "Then it is your duty to avenge them and punish those responsible. There is a Farseer right in front of you."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，你有责任为那些死难者报仇，惩罚那些该对此负责的人。而现在就有个先知站在你面前。”

languages.text: « Alors, il est de notre devoir de les venger et de punir les responsables. Il y a un Grand Prophète juste devant vous. »
languages.original_text: "Then it is your duty to avenge them and punish those responsible. There is a Farseer right in front of you."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, il est de notre devoir de les venger et de punir les responsables. Il y a un Grand Prophète juste devant vous. »

languages.text: "Dann ist es Eure Pflicht, sie zu rächen und die Verantwortlichen dafür zu bestrafen. Und direkt vor Euch ist einer der Runenpropheten."
languages.original_text: "Then it is your duty to avenge them and punish those responsible. There is a Farseer right in front of you."

traits.locale_text: "Dann ist es Eure Pflicht, sie zu rächen und die Verantwortlichen dafür zu bestrafen. Und direkt vor Euch ist einer der Runenpropheten."

languages.text: "O hâlde onların intikamını alıp sorumluları cezalandırmakla sorumlusun. Karşında da bir Ötesezen var."
languages.original_text: "Then it is your duty to avenge them and punish those responsible. There is a Farseer right in front of you."

traits.locale_text: "O hâlde onların intikamını alıp sorumluları cezalandırmak senin görevin. Tam önünde bir Ötesezen duruyor."
